Description.Text: A charming country inn, full of character, the earliest records of the Queen`s Head date from the 17th century. It`s located in the village of Milton Ernest, an area which people began inhabiting from as early as the Saxon times. The Queen`s Head is a cosy hotel, renowned for its welcoming atmosphere. It is a charming place to stay with plenty of character, comfortable en-suite bedrooms and delicious dining, real ales and fine wines.
